org.biojava.nbio.protmod

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biojava.nbio.protmod.Component

  • public final class Component
extends Object
    contains information about a certain Component. The Component class uses the extensible enum pattern. You can't instantiate Component directly, instead you have to use one of the register and of methods.
    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Jianjiong Gao

    • Method Detail

      • getPdbccIds

        public Set<String> getPdbccIds()
        Returns:
        Protein Data Bank ID.

      • isNTerminal

        public boolean isNTerminal()
        Returns:
        true if occurring on N terminal; false, otherwise.

      • isCTerminal

        public boolean isCTerminal()
        Returns:
        true if occurring on C terminal; false, other wise.

      • of

        public static Component of(String pdbccId)
        Get a Component that does not have to occur at terminals. If the corresponding component has already been registered, return that one.
        Parameters:
        pdbccIds - possible Protein Data Bank ID.
        Returns:
        a component.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if pdbccId or type is null, or the pdbccId has been registered as a different type.

      • of

        public static Component of(String pdbccId,
           boolean isNTerminal,
           boolean isCTerminal)
        Get or create a Component.
        Parameters:
        pdbccId - Protein Data Bank ID.
        isNTerminal - true if occurring at N-terminal. false, otherwise.
        isCTerminal - true if occurring at C-terminal. false, otherwise.
        Returns:
        a component.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if pdbccId or type is null, or the pdbccId has been registered as a different type, or terminal condition is indicated for non-amino-acid component, or both N-terminal and C-terminal are true.

      • of

        public static Component of(Set<String> pdbccIds)
        Get a Component that does not have to occur at terminals. If the corresponding component has already been registered, return that one.
        Parameters:
        pdbccIds - a set of possible Protein Data Bank ID.
        Returns:
        a component.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if pdbccId or type is null, or the pdbccId has been registered as a different type.

      • of

        public static Component of(Set<String> pdbccIds,
           boolean isNTerminal,
           boolean isCTerminal)
        Get or create a Component.
        Parameters:
        pdbccIds - a set of possible Protein Data Bank ID.
        isNTerminal - true if occurring at N-terminal. false, otherwise.
        isCTerminal - true if occurring at C-terminal. false, otherwise.
        Returns:
        a component.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if pdbccId or type is null, or the pdbccId has been registered as a different type, or terminal condition is indicated for non-amino-acid component, or both N-terminal and C-terminal are true.

        public static Set<Component> allComponents()

        public String toString()
        Overrides:

        Returns:
